name: refrigerate

effect.x-y: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
